name: Term 3
description: Super Badge awarded for completion of all Term 3 Modules

criteria.narrative:
Participants must achieve the following badges to be awarded the Term 3 Super Badge:
- Cyber Security
- Communication and Public Speaking and one of the following combinations:
Developer/Tester Pathway
- Software Development
- Software Testing
Data Scientist
- Adv Data Science
- Adv Machine Learning
- Stakeholder Management
Business Analyst
- Agile Business Analyst
- Applied Data Science
- Leadership Skills
Agile PM
- Agile Project Management
- Leadership Skills
